headline: Analysts Stay Bullish on Roper Technologies (ROP) Despite Price Target Cuts Following Mixed Q4 Results
summary: Roper Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:ROP) is one of the best blue-chip stocks with 52-week lows to buy right now. On January 29, Goldman Sachs reiterated a Buy rating but cut its price target on Roper Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:ROP) to $440 from $477. The price target cut follows the fourth-quarter 2025 report, in which overall segment EBITDA […]
